story:
The Long and Short (mostly short)

Hi! I'm Matt Cummings, an artist from Canada. For the last decade or so, I've been drawing pictures for money. Usually big, fancy, flashy explosions and pretty skies but also cute characters and comics.

Last year, I had a lot of fun practicing my portrait/caricature skills via commissions in a cute style. They proved to be pretty popular and, to date, I've completed over 300 of 'em!

But now I want to expand that number! I want to see how many different people I can draw. So many smiling faces! How could I go wrong (:

Deliveries, On the Double!

The beauty of this project is in its simplicity - The second I get your donation/reference photo, I add you to the list and you get a portrait! There isn't even any waiting until after the campaign is over. I'll start drawing and delivering them as I get 'em!

Instructions: email me at matt @ eiffelart.ca with the subject INDIEGOGO and include as many reference photos as you like! Make sure to let me know which email address you paid with (:

You'll recieve a high-resolution (7.2 inches squared at 300dpi) file which you can print out and hang or use on any number of websites or WHATEVER YOU LIKE. It's your face! Use it!

I'm offering a couple different types of portraits, too! You can get a single person portrait (great for gifts!), you can get a 2-person portrait (great for printing out and hangin' on the wall!) (ALSO, since I've been asked, you can totally have your pets in there, too!!)

The Impact

Mostly, I just want to draw a zillion people but the money raised is important, too!

All funds I raise from this project will help me travel to conventions like SPX and TCAF. These are Important Events, since they mean the chances of us high-fiving? WAY increased. Hugs? Oh, you bet.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no worries! Any help spreading the word about these cool portraits will be most appreciated, though. Thank you!
story_txt:
The Long and Short (mostly short)

Hi! I'm Matt Cummings, an artist from Canada. For the last decade or so, I've been drawing pictures for money. Usually big, fancy, flashy explosions and pretty skies but also cute characters and comics.
Last year, I had a lot of fun practicing my portrait/caricature skills via commissions in a cute style. They proved to be pretty popular and, to date, I've completed over 300 of 'em!
But now I want to expand that number! I want to see how many different people I can draw. So many smiling faces! How could I go wrong (:


Deliveries, On the Double!

The beauty of this project is in its simplicity - The second I get your donation/reference photo, I add you to the list and you get a portrait! There isn't even any waiting until after the campaign is over. I'll start drawing and delivering them as I get 'em!
Instructions: email me at matt @ eiffelart.ca with the subject INDIEGOGO and include as many reference photos as you like! Make sure to let me know which email address you paid with (:
You'll recieve a high-resolution (7.2 inches squared at 300dpi) file which you can print out and hang or use on any number of websites or WHATEVER YOU LIKE. It's your face! Use it!
I'm offering a couple different types of portraits, too! You can get a single person portrait (great for gifts!), you can get a 2-person portrait (great for printing out and hangin' on the wall!) (ALSO, since I've been asked, you can totally have your pets in there, too!!)


The Impact

Mostly, I just want to draw a zillion people but the money raised is important, too!
All funds I raise from this project will help me travel to conventions like SPX and TCAF. These are Important Events, since they mean the chances of us high-fiving? WAY increased. Hugs? Oh, you bet.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, no worries! Any help spreading the word about these cool portraits will be most appreciated, though. Thank you!

story:
Our Story

Hello there, my name is Jamie Bizness.

I am an artist and one part of a collective comprised of myself and Rylsee from Switzerland, who I have been collaborating with for the past year. He has recently returned to his home (Geneva) in hopes of also raising enough money to attend a show that we have both been invited to in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

It will take place in a major gallery and we have been asked to have a solo show with the collection that we created. The collection is made up of 24 pieces. Four large acrylic on wood panel 48” x 36”, eighteen ink on paper illustrations, framed and two 56" x 48” Stonehenge paper illustrations. The latter are also done with two invited guest artists, Vincent Parker and Andrea Baeza, both of Vancouver BC, Canada.

I hope to raise enough money for a flight and accommodations while I am down there because it was such short notice. I’m not sure I will be able to raise enough funds on my own, so I am asking for help from art lovers everywhere :) Help me get to Brazil!

One Love.

The Impact

The impact that this campaign will have on my career as an artist and Rylsee’s career as well, is that it will allow us to achieve our goal of getting to a show that we worked so hard to put together in a very short amount of time. I have grown so much as an artist over the last six months working with Rylsee and I would love to see our project finalized. A collection that I did with another artist went to Mexico two years ago (PUT A LINK TO SHOTS OF IT HERE) and I was not able to attend. I don't want that to happen again. This would enable me to attend the show, meet possible investors for my art and the art of my friends. We are also representatives of Vancouver and Canada, and it is amazing to cross borders with art and blend cultures.

This experience can only contribute to create a more amazing world where we all understand each other’s cultures. Art is an amazing way to express these things and I would love the opportunity to represent Vancouver artists down in Sao Paulo.

What We Need & What You Get

I will need quite a fair amount of money. I have researched the cost of the flight and it is 1500 dollars alone return, I will need money for accommodations and food, as well as local travel. I hope to stay for two months to work with other artists on a few mural projects and to put together some workshops for kids about art. I hope to rent a little studio to be able to create more art while I am down there and establish some connections with other artists, to hopefully set up a residency program back in Vancouver, so I’d like to stay as long as possible. The reason I am asking for the sum of 6000 is for the cost of living, as the cost of living here is so high and the notice to go was so short that I was not able to save enough money to get to Brazil. I have spent all my extra time and money creating the collection and paying rent and food, it’s so hard to even fathom going down there, but I really want to go .

So I have lots and lots of original art and prints available for perks :)

- 15 dollars I will send you a signed and numbered print 8.5 x 11

- 25 dollars I will send you a signed and numbered print 11 x 17

- 50 dollars I will send you a signed, original drawing 8.5 x 11

- 75 dollars I will send you a signed, original drawing 11 x 17

- 100 dollars I will send you a signed, original drawing 8.5 x 11, print 8.5 x 11, a limited edition collaborative hand sewn zine called 1/100 Batteries Not Included. The zine depicts different styles of boom boxes, over 10 pages, 5 Jamie Biz drawings and 5 Rylsee drawings.

- 150 dollars I will create a 8" x 8 " original painting for you signed

- 200 dollars I will create a 12" x 12" original painting for you signed

- 300 dollars I will create a 12" x 24" original painting for you signed

- 500 dollars I will create a 2' x 2' original painting for you signed

- 1000 dollars I will create a 4' x 4 ' original painting for you signed

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word, any promo will help and I would love if you *?* some of my art :)

story:
Our Story


First, if you have not listened to the audio/video, I ask that you do before you read this. That is part of my life story. I was raped by my parents from the age of 9-13. Then I was put in the foster system, and raped by one of my foster parents. From that I went into a relationship at the age of 17 years old. I stayed in this relationship, marring this man, for 13 years. In these 13 years, I experienced mental, physical, emotional, and spiritual abuse. This video has reached almost 1000 people, and has helped many walk away from such situations. One such person, was able to get her and her 3 daughters away, and move to another state. Then, she was able to start a Domestic Violence organization there. This is just a small part of my story. My desire now, is, to do a tour of the East Coast, going into any and every door I can get into, with my message of hope, to offer help, and hope to those that feel helpless, and hopeless. Many of these women, go to work, and appear normal every day. Then go home, to fight for their, and even sometimes, their children's and families lives.


The Impact

My campaign, is a campaign of hope. The lives it will impact, or touch, is way beyond anything I can type on a computer screen. If, a simple audio/video, can stir fathers up to protect their children more, cause mothers to have enough strength to leave DV situations, cause men to say they will not allow their loved ones to be abused any more. What more could hearing it in person do? I refuse to believe, that people will look at this campaign and NOT help me with it. So, I will not even be touching on that base. Through going into open mics, poetry shows, women's groups, and any and every door I can get in, there will be an awesome impact of hope and encouragement...............We are in the middle of designing special t-shirts, and other tools of encouragement to leave with these women. A survivor's kit may be the best way to describe it. 

What We Need & What You Get


I need as much funding as possible, I am believing for at least 10,000. I know that sounds like a lot, but, a Domestic Violence shelter can not pay for me to come speak to their women. A rape crisis center may not be able to pay for me to come speak. I want this first tour to be on the East Coast. I plan on going to no less than 10 states. I also am in need of supplies. I don't want to say something all flowery to these women then leave them hanging. Oh just another person coming through to share their story. I have a mini book ready to go to the printers called "The Midnight Hour". This mini book will hold just a few of my inspirational poems, and encouraging words. It will be the size to fit in a back pocket. It is for when they are in their "Midnight Hour" and just need that little connection. I do not want to sell these to these women, I want to GIVE them to them...........No matter how much funding I get, I will go on tour. I may not be able to help as many women/men as I want to, but I will help as many as I can.


Funds collected will go towards the following:
*Audio Recording, Production and Duplication Costs
*Travel and Accommodations while on Tour
*Tour and CD Promotional Materials 

*Survivor's Kit (items included will be released soon)

*Publication of books for use on the tour

*Making of T-shirts

*Dinner for me and one "DV or Rape victim" per City visited


Other Ways You Can Help

You can also help, but not just by helping to fund this project, but by telling others about this campaign. Thus giving other's a chance to help as well. Please don't forget about the share button, its just that easy.  Post it on your websites, in your blogs, on promo pages................any where you can think of...............thank you


Huniie

story:
For over forty years, Austinites and visitors alike have enjoyed the murals painted by Austintatious Artists Kerry Awn, tommyb, and Rick Turner on the walls of the University Coop at the Renaissance Market at 23rd Street and Guadalupe. Recently, these beloved artworks have been defaced by unknown vandals. The University Coop estimates a restoration cost of at least $30,000, but lacks the funds to complete a restoration.

We, the original artists, have taken the responsibility to create a crowdsourcing campaign in order to return these two murals to their former glory. Our goal is to completely restore both the murals (Austintatious mural 1974 and the Tejas mural 2003).  These murals have been a part of the fabric of Austin for 40 years and  have come to represent the link between the olde Austin and the new Austin of today. They are a living history book documenting our city and state and have stood the test of time but are due for a make over.  This not only includes repainting the vandalized areas, but also repairing stucco damage, faded and cracked paint, and an application of a fresh antigraffiti coating. 

The restoration of both murals is expected to take 10 weeks.  The restoration is planned to begin on March 15, 2014, and continue until June 1st, if there is sufficient funding.  

  • We will first clean, power wash and repair the walls as they have cracked and been damaged over time.
  • We will completely repaint both murals ( Austintatious = 608 sq. ft.  Tejas = 1078 sq. ft.) to their original brilliance. 
  •  We will add, update and refresh the murals. We can’t help it…we love to paint.
  • When finished painting, we will seal both murals with the proper sealant to insure us from future damage.
  • The University Co op will insure proper lighting of the area and install video cameras for future safety.

Come by and watch the artists at work, see the progress and meet the artists. We want these murals to last another 40 years.

Austintatious Artists

Keeping Austintatious weird since1974


Austintatious Mural

Painted in 1974, retouched in 1982 and 2002

Tejas Mural

Painted 2003



The damage done...

story:
Just an Idea of How I want the new cover to look as opposed to the old, boring and misleading cover.

Synopsis:

Like so many of us, twenty-four year old Michael is tired of his monotonous existence. Then one morning he awakens in an abandoned alleyway; covered in blood and completely naked. After a narrow escape from authorities he is captured and imprisoned by a mysterious group who seem to possess unusual powers. Suddenly life is anything but boring. While learning to develop and utilize mind blowing, incredible abilities he is plunged into an unbelievable but very real adventure with evil incarnate. Like a great puzzle, pieces of a grand design begin to fit and Michael must accept truth and dismiss fiction as he discovers an ancient prophecy that threatens all life on this planet and how this threat directly relates to him. He must understand that he has a part to play in the events that have already been set in motion in the first installment of this ultimate theme of good versus evil.

About Me

I am Stephen Alexander, the author of the bestselling title: The Book Of Neophyte: The Awakening. The 445 page long novel was launched in the fall of 2011 and since then had climbed it's way to #2 best selling saga on the biggest e-book site in the world. I have had significant exposure in the media including newspaper and radio interviews; most notable with the Legendary Fearless Fred of 102.1 The Edge during prime time with over 1.4 million listeners. Some are posted below so feel free to watch/listen. I am a go-getter, a self-published author; an honest, reliable, friendly true believer that maintains faith that humanity has the will to see itself through anything! I'm a college graduate, painter, sketcher, super-geek, paranormalist, paranoid, truth-seeking, riddle-solving maniac with a thirst for knowledge and a good taste in beer! I've been around the block, through the ringer and in and out of sanity. I never debate a fact unless I'm positive I can win and when I step up to the plate I bring everything I got! I fight tooth and nail for what's right regardless of how long the detour might be or how high the obstacles are. I work hard, I play hard. I don't do drugs but I love to dance. I have many friends and few enemies. I am an Author, an artist, a musician, a teacher, a survivor, a lover and a fighter...And I have one hell of an epic story to tell!!!!!

Goals

The purpose of this campaign is to have the The Awakening completely re-edited, re-designed and relaunched. Despite the success of this first installment of an 8-10 part saga, the proofreading and editing wasn't exactly up to standards and I would very much like to have it revamped before it's sequel is released in the summer of 2014. Depending on the success of this campaign I will also be attending Fan Expo/Comic-con this summer to promote the new installment and hopefully a summer book tour as well.

The success of this campaign will allow for more product and a truly professional outlook on the series; resulting in wider exposure, expansion of the fan base and the professional edge that the series truly deserves. Most importantly in gives you (the investors) the chance to come along with me on what is promising to be one hell of a ride. A ride that will be fully documented along the way!

If you come to see me in person, Simply mention that you are a pledge on Indiegogo (whether you pledged this project or others) and receive free goodies! No questions asked.

Expenses

-Proofreading and Editing: A costly process, luckily the editor and proofreader has great faith in my work and has agreed to complete the revamp for a mere $2000. A small fraction of what it usually costs.

-Promotional Material: Posters, backdrop & table wrap(I already have my originals but would like to update if possible), bookmarks, in-slits, costumes and a few props will cost roughly $3000 (this is the cheapest quote I could get without sacrificing quality)

-Advertising: A Full scale book launch can cost tens of thousands and up, Through a few connections I was able to secure a local Advertising campaign quote for $2150. This will include Google, Facebook etc...(the basics) Local media print and ads. Depending on success of this campaign, funds will allow for announcements anticipating book signing events in any cities in which I pass through. The more successful the Campaign, the more advertising I can build.

-Books!: Copies of the book for distribution approx. $2500-$3000 depending on how many hardcovers are required for perks.

-2014 Book Tour: This will take roughly 4-6 weeks on the road. Any additional funds will pay for travel expenses. (Gas, motels etc...)

-Book Trailer: This Will require very little as I have made arrangements with a local colleges film students to take on the projects and most decent actors/actresses will work just to add to their portfolio. Mostly props and rental equipment will needed $200-$500.

-Perks: Filling quotas to deliver the perks you deserve! The best quality with the most gratitude for your generous contribution.

What you get out of it!

Incentives are:

  • Signed Softcover, Hardcover and E book Copies of The Book of Neophyte:The Awakening (Revamped)
  • Basic and/or Personal Mentions in the Credits of the Book
  • Posters, Bookmarks, Bumper stickers, Decals & other little surprises ;D
  • Sneak Peaks at future installments of the Neophyte Series
  • Teaser Material of unrelated books that will be launched in within the year
  • Desktop Wallpaper
  • Thank you E-cards
  • EXCLUSIVE signed, full prints of the original Manuscript!
  • Original, signed prints of the conceptual art
  • Character Creation!!! Be in the book! : This is where you, a loved one, or a creation of your own will be written into a future installment of the book. Note: Characters must work with the current plot; we'll make it work ;D
    *Signed copy of whatever future installment that your character will appear (depending on how I like your character it could be All!! Extensive communication will be required)
  • Facebook video chat or phone call from yours truly
  • Dedication: Though the book is already dedicated to the memory of my grandfather, we shall add your dedication along with it. Thanks to the ISBN number, thousands of years from now, future generations will be able to see your dedication. Let it echo through time itself, or perhaps propose to a would be fiance that's a fan of literature. Leave a memory that they'll never forget!!

If the Goal is not reached, funds will be used in order of priority

  1. Revamping The Awakening
  2. Books
  3. Perks
  4. Promotional Material
  5. Fan Expo/Comic-con
  6. Ad Campaign
  7. Book Tour

Bookmarks (4of 12)

The Impact

This Book will be but the falling stone of a following avalanche; The result of over 4 years of hard work and decades of research. Extensive study into subjects that many fear to tread such as Demonology, Spirituality, Religion, Politics, Love, History and so many more. I have many e-mail pertaining to reports of paranormal activity, restoring of faith,  nightmares, even visions believe it or not...seems to vary depending on the reader. This installment is called the Awakening for a very specific reason. Readers will go along with the main character in an unforgettable journey that will awaken the mind, body and soul and allows us to safely question what we have been taught as a society. Concepts that will expand the way we see the living plane and far beyond the afterlife and time itself. What approaches the world we know is a an evolution of spirituality; something humanity truly needs right now.

This will be my second attempt to back this project. Currently engaged in The Kickstarter program but it seems that people are more interested in video games than anything that may touch your heart or take you through an infinity of possibilities. I know for a fact that print isn't dead so I thought maybe try a more sophisticated crowd. The first launch was fully funded out of my own pocket; a debt that took years to pay off. Hopefully this time around I won't have to do this on my own ;)

Traditional publishing is an option but because of the books controversial topis (...and there are and will be many) I have been told that I have to dumb down or remove what publishers seem to think the world isn't ready for. I call bullsh#t! I think the world needs something fresh, honest, raw and unyielding for a change. But hey, you be the judge.

If you cannot afford to give much, I am more than willing to send you a copy of the original e-book; free of charge. Simply like my Facebook page and send me a message titled "gimme gimme" along with an e-mail address (I refuse to spam! You have my word.) and the copy is yours to enjoy ($9.99 value) until the closing of the project period. My gift to you in hope that you will spread the word and make some noise about the campaign and The Book of Neophyte series! The choice to wait for the revamp is entirely yours :) and don't forget to use the Indiegogo Share tools!!!


Conceptual Art (1 of hundreds)

Sample: Chapter 7, Page 77

. ‘Why did Samael refer to God as two separate sexes?’ I probe, hoping that she can shine some light on the subject. ‘To understand, you must see the Holy Trinity for what it is. People often confuse the three entities as a singular being. Like any form of order and affection, the Holy Trinity is actually a family. The father being the final word and the firm hand of discipline; the Holy Spirit being the mother figure, the compassion and affection that only a mother can give; and of course the son. He is the Neophyte of the three; the constantly learning being of hope and knowledge. A hybrid of both discipline and compassion, yet born as a human.It really is quite moving when you think about it. These ideals are set upon humanity naturally yet so many look down upon women because of it.’

‘What do you mean?’ I ask. ‘Well, the Vatican has a real problem with women. They made sure to take out any reference of the Holy Spirit as a female entity. By doing so it began a long and enduring battle for women seeking any kind of equal rights.’ The sound of her voice is rather soothing and as I take her explanation with a grain of salt, the sense of strong womanhood is felt within her sentences. She continues as we slowly move along a vast expansive hallway lined with exquisite paintings and statues.

‘The chauvinistic men who rewrote the scriptures absolutely refused to believe that a woman could possibly have a hand in their own creation. This is what sculpted generations after generations of male chauvinism amongst men. Imagine a world where we’re all treated as equals. It’s really only the tip of the iceberg. God gives us a gift that would ensure peace on earth and men find a way to use it as a means of control. Their hypocrisy truly has no bounds. Women play a much broader part in the guidance and overall being of human development than most people give us credit for. Take the order of the average family to its roots and how the individuals who are part of that family unit really feel and you will find that nurturing will usually come naturally to the mother figure and discipline with the father figure. Men need that assurance of control over the entire unit for some strange reason. Personally I see it as a flaw rather than a blessing, simply because it’s carried too far.’ ‘So you’re saying that control over the family is something that is given to the male because that’s what we need to function within the family unit?’ ‘It’s nothing personal and the position is there regardless of gender.’ Okay, now I’m confused. ‘Michael; in every relationship whether it be gay or straight, there is always one who wears the pants and one who is more nurturing and compassionate. Fatherhood and motherhood is a position in the unit regardless of gender.’

‘Speaking of gifts, something has been bugging me. How is it that you can do the things that you do?’ She stumbles on her words before she answers, possibly unsure how to explain it. ‘We..., I.... Okay; you’ve heard of psychic abilities?’ I’m confused. A comical vision of Samael hovering over a crystal ball makes me chuckle slightly. ‘Psychics? Like gypsies or something?’ I try to relate. ‘Well, it’s based on that principal,’ she responds. ‘Every being is capable of such abilities; unfortunately, we have all been programmed to dismiss anything that may be even the slightest bit extraordinary. Society exiles those who are different; which is fine by me. They laugh at us because we are different. We laugh at them, because they are all the same. We must learn to accept that we are the same in many ways but as human beings we are of wondrous variety. If mankind ever embraced this, they would find a personal power that is as unique as their fingerprints.’

‘Here at the Sanctuary, we excel in the extraordinary and as a Neophyte, you will learn what this world really is and embrace your natural talents. No tricks, illusions or lies to blind you from your destiny.’
story_txt:
Just an Idea of How I want the new cover to look as opposed to the old, boring and misleading cover.Synopsis:Like so many of us, twenty-four year old Michael is tired of his 
monotonous existence. Then one morning he awakens in an abandoned 
alleyway; covered in blood and completely naked. After a narrow escape 
from authorities he is captured and imprisoned by a mysterious group who
 seem to possess unusual powers. Suddenly life is anything but boring. 
While learning to develop and utilize mind blowing, incredible abilities
 he is plunged into an unbelievable but very real adventure with evil 
incarnate. Like a great puzzle, pieces of a grand design begin to fit 
and Michael must accept truth and dismiss fiction as he discovers an 
ancient prophecy that threatens all life on this planet and how this 
threat directly relates to him. He must understand that he has a part to
 play in the events that have already been set in motion in the first 
installment of this ultimate theme of good versus evil.About MeI am Stephen Alexander, the author of the 
bestselling title: The Book Of Neophyte: The Awakening. The 445 page 
long novel was launched in the fall of 2011 and since then had climbed 
it's way to #2 best selling saga on the biggest e-book site in the 
world. I have had significant exposure in the media including newspaper 
and radio interviews; most notable with the Legendary Fearless Fred of 
102.1 The Edge during prime time with over 1.4 million listeners. Some are posted below so feel free to watch/listen. I am a go-getter, a self-published author; an honest, reliable, friendly true believer that maintains faith that humanity has the will to see itself through anything! I'm a college graduate, painter, sketcher, super-geek, paranormalist, paranoid, truth-seeking, riddle-solving maniac with a thirst for knowledge and a good taste in beer! I've been around the block, through the ringer and in and out of sanity. I never debate a fact unless I'm positive I can win and when I step up to the plate I bring everything I got! I fight tooth and nail for what's right regardless of how long the detour might be or how high the obstacles are. I work hard, I play hard. I don't do drugs but I love to dance. I have many friends and few enemies. I am an Author, an artist, a musician, a teacher, a survivor, a lover and a fighter...And I have one hell of an epic story to tell!!!!!GoalsThe purpose of this campaign is to have the The Awakening completely re-edited, re-designed and relaunched. Despite the success of this first installment of an 8-10 part saga, the proofreading and editing wasn't exactly up to standards and I would very much like to have it revamped before it's sequel is released in the summer of 2014. Depending on the success of this campaign I will also be attending Fan Expo/Comic-con this summer to promote the new installment and hopefully a summer book tour as well. The success of this campaign will allow for more product and a truly professional outlook on the series; resulting in wider exposure, expansion of the fan base and the professional edge that the series truly deserves. Most importantly in gives you (the investors) the chance to come along with me on what is promising to be one hell of a ride. A ride that will be fully documented along the way!If you come to see me in person, Simply mention that you are a pledge on Indiegogo (whether you pledged this project or others) and receive free goodies! No questions asked.Expenses 
-Proofreading and Editing: A costly process, luckily the editor and proofreader has great faith in my work and has agreed to complete the revamp for a mere $2000. A small fraction of what it usually costs.-Promotional Material: Posters, backdrop & table wrap(I already have my originals but would like to update if possible), bookmarks, in-slits, costumes and a few props will cost roughly $3000 (this is the cheapest quote I could get without sacrificing quality)-Advertising: A Full scale book launch can cost tens of thousands and up, Through a few connections I was able to secure a local Advertising campaign quote for $2150. This will include Google, Facebook etc...(the basics) Local media print and ads. Depending on success of this campaign, funds will allow for announcements anticipating book signing events in any cities in which I pass through. The more successful the Campaign, the more advertising I can build.-Books!: Copies of the book for distribution approx. $2500-$3000 depending on how many hardcovers are required for perks. -2014 Book Tour: This will take roughly 4-6 weeks on the road. Any additional funds will pay for travel expenses. (Gas, motels etc...) -Book Trailer: This Will require very little as I have made arrangements with a local colleges film students to take on the projects and most decent actors/actresses will work just to add to their portfolio. Mostly props and rental equipment will needed $200-$500.-Perks: Filling quotas to deliver the perks you deserve! The best quality with the most gratitude for your generous contribution. What you get out of it!Incentives are:
Signed Softcover, Hardcover and E book Copies of The Book of Neophyte:The Awakening (Revamped)
Basic and/or Personal Mentions in the Credits of the Book
Posters, Bookmarks, Bumper stickers, Decals & other little surprises ;D
Sneak Peaks at future installments of the Neophyte Series
Teaser Material of unrelated books that will be launched in within the year
Desktop Wallpaper
Thank you E-cards
EXCLUSIVE signed, full prints of the original Manuscript!
Original, signed prints of the conceptual art
Character Creation!!! Be in the book! : This is where you, a loved one, or a creation of your own will be written into a future installment of the book. Note: Characters must work with the current plot; we'll make it work ;D*Signed copy of whatever future installment that your character will appear (depending on how I like your character it could be All!! Extensive communication will be required)
Facebook video chat or phone call from yours truly
Dedication: Though the book is already dedicated to the memory of my grandfather, we shall add your dedication along with it. Thanks to the ISBN number, thousands of years from now, future generations will be able to see your dedication. Let it echo through time itself, or perhaps propose to a would be fiance that's a fan of literature. Leave a memory that they'll never forget!! 
If the Goal is not reached, funds will be used in order of priority
Revamping The Awakening
Books
Perks
Promotional Material
Fan Expo/Comic-con
Ad Campaign
Book Tour

Bookmarks (4of 12)The ImpactThis Book will be but the falling stone of a following avalanche; The result of over 4 years of hard work and decades of research. Extensive study into subjects that many fear to tread such as Demonology, Spirituality, Religion, Politics, Love, History and so many more. I have many e-mail pertaining to reports of paranormal activity, restoring of faith,  nightmares, even visions believe it or not...seems to vary depending on the reader. This installment is called the Awakening for a very specific reason. Readers will go along with the main character in an unforgettable journey that will awaken the mind, body and soul and allows us to safely question what we have been taught as a society. Concepts that will expand the way we see the living plane and far beyond the afterlife and time itself. What approaches the world we know is a an evolution of spirituality; something humanity truly needs right now.This will be my second attempt to back this project. Currently engaged in The Kickstarter program but it seems that people are more interested in video games than anything that may touch your heart or take you through an infinity of possibilities. I know for a fact that print isn't dead so I thought maybe try a more sophisticated crowd. The first launch was fully funded out of my own pocket; a debt that took years to pay off. Hopefully this time around I won't have to do this on my own ;)Traditional publishing is an option but because of the books controversial topis (...and there are and will be many) I have been told that I have to dumb down or remove what publishers seem to think the world isn't ready for. I call bullsh#t! I think the world needs something fresh, honest, raw and unyielding for a change. But hey, you be the judge.If you cannot afford to give much, I am more than willing to send you a copy of the original e-book; free of charge. Simply like my Facebook page and send me a message titled "gimme gimme" along with an e-mail address (I refuse to spam! You have my word.) and the copy is yours to enjoy ($9.99 value) until the closing of the project period. My gift to you in hope that you will spread the word and make some noise about the campaign and The Book of Neophyte series! The choice to wait for the revamp is entirely yours :) and don't forget to use the Indiegogo Share tools!!!Conceptual Art (1 of hundreds)Sample: Chapter 7, Page 77. ‘Why did Samael refer to God as
